title: C1 Review Quiz 2
description: Test your retention of the second half of Trimester 1.

items.explanation: Free Cash Flow to the Firm is 'unlevered'.

items.prompt: Mixed Conditional: 'If we ___ that company last year, we would be the market leader now.'
items.explanation: 'If we had acquired' (past hypothetical) 'we would be' (present result).

items.prompt: Which of these is a capital allocation decision?
items.explanation: Dividends are a major strategic use of cash.

items.prompt: Gordon Growth Method assumes a constant growth rate ___.
Formal Comparative: 'The stock trades ___ a 10% discount to its peers.'
items.explanation: The standard phrase is 'trades at a [premium/discount] to'.
